mapper.select:
select f.* ,t.typename, u.name from PartnerFile f,filetype t,stuser u
f.typeId =t.typeId and u.id =f.uploaduser and
f.fileid= #{record.fileid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
f.typeid= #{record.typeid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
f.fatherid= #{record.fatherid,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
f.filename= #{record.filename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
f.abbreviation= #{record.abbreviation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
f.permission= #{record.permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
f.uploaduser= #{record.uploaduser,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
f.saveposition= #{record.saveposition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
f.updatetime= #{record.updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
f.size= #{record.size,jdbcType=INTEGER} and
( locate(#{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR},f.filename) >0 or locate(#{search,jdbcType=VARCHAR},f.abbreviation) >0 ) and
0 =0
